Context: The LLC Laptop Loan Policy had changes on December 18, 2023. The library has various audio-visual equipment available for borrowing, including audio recorders, video cameras, GoPros, tripods, DVD player/writer, and SAD lamps. Students are required to return all technology equipment to the LLC location they borrowed it from. Contact information for the library is 416-415-2000 or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college also has a social media hub that can be visited. The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements. Equipment available: Camcorders, GoPros, Tripods, DVD player/writer, SAD Lamp. Contact details: 416-415-2000 or ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Library services and equipment subject to change.
